name: Dread (IK_Knight)
description:
Dread....

You and your friends were walking around at Halloween, then you stumbled apon the old haunted mansion. You and your friends were daring enough to go to the haunted mansion to see what actually is. but the second they came there they regretted it, help them to get out...

--WARNING--

ONLY 10+ AGE ALLOWED

otherwise play with your parents(it is scary..)

arrow keys to move 

click the object to see inside!

CREDITS

I made the game and art 

losing animation by you know who...

intro by @greedjesse
